entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
